title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition

gpu: ATI Technologies Inc. AMD Radeon R9 390
notes: Add -changedir to the games launch properties to run it. The screen doesn't update properly if 3D acceleration is turned on, so make sure to turn that off. Otherwise, no issues, aside from the seed selection screen having a low framerate (which is an upstream Wine issue.)
title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
